C

Client - Class in model
The Client class represents a client object that contains information about a specific client in the system.
Client() - Constructor for class model.Client
Default constructor for the Client class.
Client(int, String) - Constructor for class model.Client
Constructs a new Client object with the specified ID and name.
ClientBLL - Class in businessLayer
The ClientBLL class represents the business logic for handling Client operations.
ClientBLL() - Constructor for class businessLayer.ClientBLL
Constructs a new ClientBLL object.
ClientDAO - Class in dataAccessLayer
The ClientDAO class is responsible for accessing and manipulating the Client data in the database.
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class dataAccessLayer.ClientDAO
 
ClientView - Class in presentation
The ClientView class represents the graphical user interface for managing clients.
ClientView() - Constructor for class presentation.ClientView
Constructs a new instance of the ClientView class.
Controller - Class in presentation
The Controller class handles the interactions between the user interface components and the application logic.
Controller(Menu) - Constructor for class presentation.Controller
Constructs a new Controller object with the specified menu.
ControllerClient - Class in presentation
The ControllerClient class handles the interactions between the ClientView and the ClientBLL.
ControllerClient(ClientView) - Constructor for class presentation.ControllerClient
Constructs a new ControllerClient object with the specified ClientView.
ControllerOrder - Class in presentation
The ControllerOrder class handles the interactions between the OrderView and the business layer classes.
ControllerOrder(OrderView) - Constructor for class presentation.ControllerOrder
Constructs a new ControllerOrder object with the specified OrderView.
ControllerProduct - Class in presentation
The ControllerProduct class handles the interactions between the ProductView and the business layer components.
ControllerProduct(ProductView) - Constructor for class presentation.ControllerProduct
Constructs a ControllerProduct object with the specified ProductView.
